nodes.text: Virmeude Starport was a spaceport, that was located on the world Virmeude. It was operated by the Issham Mining Corporation, a front company for the Alliance to Restore the Republic.

The Starport was located deep beneath the frozen bedrock of Virmeude. It operated standard spaceport facilities, catering for Alliance ships only. It was often frequented by Rebel privateers and Alliance smugglers.
